overview:
Mr. Elgressy is a high-tech entrepreneur with more than 18 years of experience in technology and business. Mr. Elgressy is the President and co-founder of SupportSpace a leading online support service. Before launching SupportSpace, Mr. Elgressy was the owner and CEO of Primary Hi-Tech Ventures, an early-stage investment boutique. He founded Security-7, an information security software company, which was subsequently acquired by Computer Associates, Inc. (NYSE:CA).

Mr. Elgressy served as VP R&D of Carmel Software, which produced software licensed to Symantec and Microsoft, who distributed more than 20 million copies. Symantec (NASDAQ: SYMC) acquired Carmel’s technology through the acquisition of Central Point.
